skins.shipDescription: Universal Bulin. Can be used to limit break all ships of Elite rarity or below.
skins.selfIntroduction: They say I'm just like my sister, but we're actually in charge of different colors... What's a color? Sounds yummy!
skins.acquisition: Buli? Seems like I can help make your fleet stronger, buli!
skins.login: If I swing this wrench hard enough, I could poke a hole in the office floor, buli!
skins.details: Buli? Buli? Where are we? What are we gonna do here?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Us Bulins are pretty awesome, buli!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Is there nothing for Bulin to do? Really? Then let's go play! Wheee!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, let's go dig for some treasure, buli~!
skins.secretaryTouch: Buli? Do you want to be bulified?

skins.CNClientName: 泛用型强化武装(工作用)
skins.shipDescription: Buli? Did I just get an upgrade buli?! Now, I can fight too buli!
